attributes.action: increase the social security funeral payment from the maximum paid of £700 to people who are in receipt of benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
families who have been bereaved are being put into debt to pay for a basic funeral for a loved one,the government will not pay for even the most basic of funerals which costs at least £2000.a basic casket costs more than 
£400 that leaves £300 for al other costs ,cars moving a loved  one etc
